name: applescript-js
readme:
# applescript-js [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/lukaskollmer/applescript-js.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/lukaskollmer/applescript-js) [![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/lukaskollmer/applescript-js/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/lukaskollmer/applescript-js?branch=master) > Run AppleScript scripts from NodeJS ## Install ``` $ npm install --save applescript-js ``` ## Usage ```js const AppleScript = require('applescript-js'); let script = new AppleScript('tell application "Safari" to get URL of current tab of window 1'); script.run(); // => 'https://github.com/' ``` ## API #### `AppleScript#compile() -> boolean` Compile the script, if it is not already compiled. This method throws an error if there's a problem compiling the script. #### `AppleScript#run() -> string` Execute the script, compiling it first if it is not already compiled.
This method throws an error if there's a problem running the script. #### `AppleScript#source` The source code of the script #### `AppleScript#compiled` A boolean value indicating whether the script has been compiled ## License MIT Â© [Lukas Kollmer](https://lukas.vip)
